featured.text: Green tea is dried but not fermented, and this shorter processing gives it a lighter flavor than black tea.

definition.zh_def: 發酵，指微生物將糖類轉化為酒精或酸等物質的過程。
definition.en_def: To undergo a chemical change, especially involving the conversion of sugars into alcohol or acids by microorganisms.
definition.example: The grapes will ferment into wine over the next few weeks.
